characters: Driver of a red car, motorcyclist, driver of a white car, driver of a red truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A motorcyclist is seen moving ahead in the same lane. A red truck is parked on the right side of the road. A white car suddenly cuts into the lane from the left side, causing the motorcyclist to swerve and potentially creating a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the red car ahead. The motorcyclist in the same lane moves forward steadily. The sudden appearance of the white car from the left lane forces the motorcyclist to swerve, indicating a potential cut-in behavior. The self-driving vehicle may need to decelerate to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red car, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward. 3) Left: A white car, approximately 15 meters away, suddenly cutting into the lane. 4) Right: A red truck, approximately 20 meters away, parked.
